title: Crosby evidence used to support argument

content.prompt: Which of the following best describes evidence used by Crosby to support his argument about the change in Native American populations after 1492 ?

choices.label: The Spanish sought to use Native Americans as laborers on encomiendas.
Columbus trained Native Americans as translators and guides.
Enslaved Americans who were taken to Europe experienced high mortality rates.
Some diseases affecting Native Americans originated in the Americas.

topic.text: 1.6: Cultural Interactions Between Europeans, Native Americans, and Africans

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
